unnormalised: Arrey bhai, did you check if they deliver to my area? It's a bit remote - Village Rampur, Post Office Mirzapur, Dist. Azamgarh, UP, Pin Code 276121. Last time, DTDC said "area not serviceable" - total time waste! Better confirm before I prepone my plans for the delivery, ya?
